sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: There's a fire starting in my heart
Reaching a fever pitch, it's bringing me out the dark
Finally I can see you crystal clear
Go ahead and sell me out and I'll lay your ship bare
See how I'll leave with every piece of you
Don't underestimate the things that I will do
There's a fire starting in my heart
Reaching a fever pitch and it's bringing me out the dark

sections.name: Pré refrain
lyrics: The scars of your love remind me of us
They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
The scars of your love they leave me breathless
I can't help feeling

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: We could've had it all
Rolling in the deep
You had my heart inside of your hands
And you played it to the beat

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Baby, I have no story to be told
But I've heard one on you, now I'm gonna make your head burn
Think of me in the depths of your despair
Make a home down there, as mine sure won't be shared

sections.name: Pré refrain
lyrics: The scars of your love remind me of us
They keep me thinking that we almost had it all
The scars of your love they leave me breathless
I can't help feeling

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: We could've had it all
Rolling in the deep
You had my heart inside of your hands
And you played it to the beat
We could've had it all
Rolling in the deep
You had my heart inside of your hand
But you played it with a beating

sections.name: Couplet!sec
lyrics: Throw your soul through every open door
Count your blessings to find what you look for
Turn my sorrow into treasured gold
You pay me back in kind and reap just what you've sown

sections.name: Pont!planant
lyrics: We could've had it all
We could've had it all
It all, it all, it all

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: We could've had it all
Rolling in the deep
You had my heart inside of your hands
And you played it to the beat
Could've had it all
Rolling in the deep
You had my heart inside of your hands
But you played it, you played it, you played it
You played it to the beat
